Five Hygiene Tips: ①
■Call in if you are sick and
do not come in. Sickness
includes cold, diarrhea,
nausea and other symptoms of
infectious illness.

Five Hygiene Tips: ②
■If you are already at work
and you feel unwell, let
your manager know.

Five Hygiene Tips: ③
■Do not touch food if your
hands have cuts, scratches
or open wounds.

Five Hygiene Tips: ④
■Keep your nails trimmed.

Five Hygiene Tips: ⑤
■Tie back long hair and keep
it under your hat/visor.
